email.title: Mums and Dads Parents Registration Closing Soon
email.text:
Have you already proposed to your partner-to-be? It's now or never because parents sign up is **closing tomorrow (Saturday 7th Sep) at 1PM!**
[Click here to sign up as a parent!](https://mad.docsoc.co.uk/parent)
After we have registered all couples we will open the freshers sign up and will allocate your children just in time for the start of the year. So make sure that your partner has accepted your proposal by the deadline tomorrow in order for you to be registered as parents and be on the look out for your newly allocated family!
